descript.abstract: [Metadata] Locations of adult day health centers in the State of Hawaii as of November 2021. Source: Created by Hawaii Statewide GIS Program from data downloaded from Hawaii State Department of Health Office of Health Care Assurance (OHCA), November 2021. For more information, please see metadata at https://files.hawaii.gov/dbedt/op/gis/data/Adult_Day_Health_Centers.pdf or contact Hawaii Statewide GIS Program, Office of Planning and Sustainable Development, State of Hawaii; PO Box 2359, Honolulu, Hi. 96804; (808) 587-2846; email: gis@hawaii.gov; Website: https://planning.hawaii.gov/gis.
descript.purpose: Locations of adult day health centers in the State of Hawaii as of November 2021.
